name: Mekafusion #10 BM10-ULTRA
description:
Model: BM10-ULTRA ( Base Mekanoid no.10 - ULTRA )
Series: FIGHTER

★ Properties
• Type: Base Mekanoid
• Skills: Flexible movements that imitate human fighting combat.
• Perks: Fighting Spirit, Chi Energy

A Base Mekanoid soldier model main component unit for the Mekafusion FIGHTER series. Powerful Mechas that powers up using Chi Energy (power from within), enhanced with fighting spirit.

✡ It has 5 Editions that represent the mighty morphing power of 5 warriors.

⚔ The Project - Mekafusion [ Mekanic Fusion ] 
An alliance between Meka and Meta to join forces to form ultimate mechanical robotic machines in different series of factions in the Metaverse.

These are digitally hand-drawn and rendered in 2D artwork to make Robotic Figures 'Mekanoid'. The concept comes in different series to give mechas their Artificial Intelligence to capture human character to make lots of unique iconic figures in Mekafusions.

The goal is to make robot designs as it was been my childhood hobby to draw robots minted in Tezos blockchain as Non-fungible Tokens (NFT) to give opportunities to art collectors and traders. Artwork is created in image 4000x4000 pixel HD resolution to satisfy its quality.

You can visit me on my Twitter page as the creator of Mekafusion - @XTZverse

★★★★★
Visit webpage for more information: mekafusion.com
